themes.name: Cool
themes.author: sreegjl
themes.description:
A clean, cool-toned theme with soft contrast for everyday use. 
Reccomended Font: Inter (Default)

themes.name: Console
themes.author: sreegjl
themes.description:
A terminal-inspired dark theme with high contrast and muted accents. 
Reccomended Font: Space Mono

themes.name: Mocha
themes.author: sreegjl
themes.description:
A dark brown theme with warm tones and restrained, low-contrast accents. 
Reccomended Font: Joan

themes.name: Nebula
themes.author: sreegjl
themes.description:
A sci-fi inspired dark theme with deep blue-purple tones and vivid pink accents. 
Reccomended Font: Goldman

themes.name: Strawberry
themes.author: sreegjl
themes.description:
A light, airy theme with a creamy background and soft strawberry-red accents. 
Reccomended Font: Red Rose
